name: The Unlikely Legend of Rusty Pup
description: From the original creator of Conker's Bad Fur Day comes a delicately told tale of a dog that thinks it's a toy, or is it a toy that thinks it's a dog?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-3330 3GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7770 1GB Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any OpenAL supported Additional Notes: Will run on lower spec GFX cards if you enable lo-res textures in the config.txt file
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-2600 3.4GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 780 / AMD Radeon R9 290X 1GB Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any OpenAL supported
